channel.description: Recent content in Foursquare on bradorego.com

item.title: Foursquare Heatmap & Remote Sensing
item.description: TL;DNR Foursquare’s API and Google Maps are pretty easy to work with. Creating a new product can be as easy as combining two existing technologies. New products create opportunities for new experiences. A little over a month ago (technically during the Foursquare Hackathon, but I was working from home due to Red Eye) I spent a few hours one weekend hacking together an idea I’d come up with when working on Foursquare integration for Trinker.
